chunk:
Baeblu, Photoshoot CC Cream, South Beach

Brand: BaeBlu

Category: CC Cream

Ingredients: Water, *Chamomile Hydrosol (Matricaria Recutita), *Glycerin, *Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, *Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, *Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, *Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, *Butyrospermum

tter, *Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), *Rosa Moschata Seed Oil, *Cera Alba (Beeswax),*Lecithin,*Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Kombucha (Sweet Black Tea), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, May Contain: Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Zinc Oxide(CI 77947), Iron Oxide

I 77947), Iron Oxide(CI 77491), Iron Oxide(CI 77499), Iron Oxide(CI 77492)

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
